paragraph.paragraph: Every assembly reference in an EiffelEnvision project has a context menu. Below describes the options available for the context menu and their actions.

View in Object Browser
Opens the ../../../code_browsing/object_browser/index.xml Object Browser and highlights the corresponding assembly present in the EiffelEnvision project section of the Object Browser.

Remove
Removes the reference from the project.
For reference_folder.xml com COM References any generated interop assembly will be removed from the obj folder once the assembly has been removed.
For reference_folder.xml static Static Assembly References Remove will be unavailable because EiffelEnvision handles the adding and removing of these types of references.

Properties
Displays the properties window for the selected reference ../../configuring/adding_references/configuring_references.xml Properties .
